review_data.title: Closed !!

review_data.title: Cheap, yet tasty indian/Pakistani food (halal) in the center of Zürich

review_data.title: Excelent Halal Indo-Pak Restaurant in Zurich

review_data.title: Nice tasty food
review_data.content: I went there twice during my stay in Zurich. The food was nice, tasty and the quantity was sufficient. Recommended to do dine in so that you can enjoy all the extra side orders.

review_data.title: Budget Indian meal of good quallity
review_data.content: In a city as expensive as Zurich, this restaurant can be a Godsend. For about 10 Euros one can have a three course dinner. There is no ambience for this price of course. However, one can sit outside in open air on the sidewalk.

review_data.title: Great Food with Value in Zurich
review_data.content: We had a chicken and lamb curry! Both were served with vegetables, rice and papadom. We had mango lassi and chai tea to drink. They were great and tasted original. We paid around 38 CHF in total. Was really great value for money and the...More

review_data.title: Best casual Indian in Zurich

review_data.title: good food!!!
review_data.content: The place is very centrally located, near the road to the old town. A plate will set you back 16 chf which is excellent value given the good quality of the dishes. Friendly staff. I can highly recommend it, ..

review_data.title: Good Food and Honest Person
review_data.content: The food was great and the person who served us was very honest and told us what was available and did not try to make extra euros by pushing things we did'nt like
